Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Springfield?
Questions.Explanation: The Simpsons is a long-running animated sitcom that takes place in the fictional town of Springfield.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends living in New York City?
Questions.Explanation: Friends is a popular sitcom that revolves around a group of friends living in New York City.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the lives of doctors at Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital?
Questions.Explanation: Grey's Anatomy is a medical drama series that focuses on the personal and professional lives of doctors at Grey Sloan Memorial Hospital.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional land of Westeros?
Questions.Explanation: Game of Thrones is a fantasy drama series that takes place in the fictional land of Westeros, known for its political intrigue and epic battles.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine manufacturer?
Questions.Explanation: Breaking Bad is a critically acclaimed drama series that follows the transformation of a high school chemistry teacher into a methamphetamine manufacturer.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the post-apocalyptic world overrun by zombies?
Questions.Explanation: The Walking Dead is a horror drama series that depicts the struggles of a group of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world infested with zombies.

Questions.Question: Which TV show revolves around a group of friends working at a paper company?
Questions.Explanation: The Office is a mockumentary sitcom that follows the daily lives of employees working at the Scranton branch of Dunder Mifflin paper company.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Stars Hollow?
Questions.Explanation: Gilmore Girls is a dramedy series that takes place in the charming fictional town of Stars Hollow, known for its quirky residents and fast-paced dialogue.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a high school teacher turned lawyer?
FalseAnswer: How to Get Away with Murder
Questions.Explanation: Better Call Saul is a prequel to Breaking Bad and follows the journey of Jimmy McGill, a small-time lawyer who eventually becomes the sleazy lawyer Saul Goodman.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the world of advertising in the 1960s?
Questions.Explanation: Mad Men is a period drama series that delves into the glamorous and cutthroat world of advertising in the 1960s.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the lives of a group of inmates in a women's prison?
Questions.Explanation: Orange Is the New Black is a dramedy series that explores the experiences of a diverse group of inmates in a women's prison.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Pawnee, Indiana?
Questions.Explanation: Parks and Recreation is a mockumentary sitcom that follows the employees of the Parks and Recreation Department in the fictional town of Pawnee.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of survivors in a post-apocalyptic world filled with flesh-eating zombies?
Questions.Explanation: The Walking Dead is a horror drama series that showcases the struggles and survival of a group of people in a world overrun by zombies.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Mystic Falls?
Questions.Explanation: The Vampire Diaries is a supernatural drama series that takes place in the fictional town of Mystic Falls, known for its vampire lore and supernatural beings.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the lives of a group of friends living in Los Angeles?
Questions.Explanation: Friends is a beloved sitcom that revolves around the lives and misadventures of a group of friends living in Los Angeles.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Twin Peaks?
Questions.Explanation: Twin Peaks is a mystery drama series that takes place in the small fictional town of Twin Peaks, known for its quirky characters and supernatural elements.

Questions.Question: Which TV show features a group of friends navigating their personal and professional lives in Chicago?
FalseAnswer: How to Get Away with Murder
Questions.Explanation: The Good Wife is a legal drama series that follows the journey of Alicia Florrick, a woman who returns to her legal career after her husband's scandal.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Sunnydale?
Questions.Explanation: Buffy the Vampire Slayer is a supernatural drama series that takes place in the fictional town of Sunnydale, known for its vampire and demon activity.

Questions.Question: Which TV show follows the lives of a group of friends living in a Brooklyn apartment building?
Questions.Explanation: Brooklyn Nine-Nine is a comedy series that revolves around the lives of detectives and staff at the 99th precinct in Brooklyn, New York.

Questions.Question: Which TV show is set in the fictional town of Hawkins, Indiana?
Questions.Explanation: Stranger Things is a science fiction horror series that takes place in the fictional town of Hawkins, known for its supernatural occurrences and government conspiracies.
